directions: In a large bowl, gently mix the peas, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, green onions, celery, tomatoes, and bacon pieces. Season with salt, pepper, and dry ranch salad dressing mix. Chill at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed and drained
1 teaspoon dry ranch salad dressing mix
title: Seven Layer Mixed Up Salad
